title: BRIEF-Bon-Ton Stores Files For Chapter 11 Bankruptcy - Court Filing‍​
text:
February 5, 2018 / 5:08 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Bon-Ton Stores Files For Chapter 11 Bankruptcy - Court Filing‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Bon-Ton Stores Inc : 
* LISTS ASSETS IN THE RANGE OF $1 BILLION TO $10 BILLION AND LIABILITIES IN THE RANGE OF $1 BILLION TO $10 BILLION- COURT FILING‍​ 
* FILES FOR CHAPTER 11 BANKRUPTCY IN U.S. BANKRUPTCY COURT FOR THE DISTRICT OF DELAWARE - COURT FILING‍​ Further company coverage:
